article.title: Space Sustenance
article.paragraph: Astronauts can chew and swallow in space the way we do on Earth. During the early Mercury missions, it wasnâ€™t clear if they could normally.

article.title: An Inedible Feast
article.paragraph: Shilpa Mitha crafts fabulous chutneys, dosas, and burgers. The only thing is, they're made of clay.

article.title: Pique a lo Macho
article.paragraph: Only the strong-stomached can finish this Bolivian mega-plate of hot peppers, potatoes, and meat.
